title: Random Icon?
body: I received a TSM icon out of nowhere today and I just want to know why i got it. If possible could i get a SKT T1 one instead...just asking

replies.body:
You received this icon as a result of a mistake on our part when we were sending out a distribution wave for the Alpha Client tester icons. You can keep the TSM icon, but I'm unable to exchange it for another.

Let me know if you have any questions.
